Text: Has anyone managed to download it? I have about 193 seeders and 230 peers, but the availability is 0.

@ImSoJaded

Everything seems to be ok on my end,but I don't if anyone else is having problems.I'm showing 176 seeders
Took three hours or so, but finally availability jumped above 1.0, and I managed to download it. Thanks.

@lockdonkey

I don't know why that is happening,things on my side are running fine at least that's what my client is showing.I downloaded this yesterday after ImSoJaded posted a comment and it downloaded in 3 mins.

There might be a hidden problem on my end even though everything looks okay.I'm going to look into it.

Thanks for your feedback :)
Guys, watch out - this torrent is being tracked. I got a letter from my ISP a few days after I dled this. You'd think Livy has enough cash but whatevs.
Excellent copy! I would guess the source was a professionally produced PDF identical to the print edition. If these are scans, they're excellent scans.
